message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
I think 60-40 is fair, but I'm willing to negotiate. Let's see what you propose.
Meet me in the middle, 58-42 is a compromise
I'm sticking with my initial proposal. 60-40 is fair, and I'm not sure how much longer we can keep negotiating with the money losing value so quickly.
Come on, Bob, 57-43 is as low as I'm willing to go. Inflation is killing us!
